name: Al Qaadir
description: Al Qaadir is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Powerful' or 'The Omnipotent'. It signifies Allah's absolute power and ability to do all things.
summary: The name Al Qaadir is derived from the Arabic root 'q-d-r', which denotes strength and capability. This name reflects the belief that Allah has complete control over the universe and is capable of exercising His will in all matters. It emphasizes the concept of divine power and authority in Islamic theology.
